name: Dirk Koch
content: Dirk Koch - Research Explorer The University of Manchester Dirk Koch Dr Senior Lecturer, Advanced Processor Technology https://orcid.org/0000-0002-2568-4432 Personal profile Expertise related to UN Sustainable Development Goals In 2015, UN member states agreed to 17 global Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) to end poverty, protect the planet and ensure prosperity for all.
